title: Alpha Client download size ?
body: Hello i just got inv to alpha client and i would love to now what the size of the download is ? THANKS

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Bondsmen0900,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5zUXIOay,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-22T23:43:27.021+0000)
>
> what game is this?{{champion:103}}

Hey  Bondsmen0900

Please make sure to pay attention to the date on the thread and comments to avoid necroing it. You're not in trouble but I will be disabling further commenting on this thread. If you still have a question about something feel free to get attention to it by starting a new discussion in the appropriate section of boards.
It's hard to say the size because the client is constantly updating and new assets are being created for it.  The download is 87.5 Mb, which can change after launching it and performing the install.
